entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
